headline: Building Resilient Food Systems
summary: There's a growing sense that the way we think about food, climate, and resilience is finally changing. What once felt like fragmented conversations — about risk, sustainability, and innovation — is now converging into one urgent narrative. Science, technology, and research and development (R&D) aren't side notes anymore. They are becoming the foundation of how we urgently need to reimagine the future of food.

thumbnail.caption: David Lestage, VP, Chief R&D Officer, Kellanova and Julie Reneau, Head of Coffee Sustainability & Regenerative Agriculture, Nespresso at Reuters @ Climate Week NYC 2025
